FF21627141685039F510F685ACF3AF6B: Agent Peely informed us of an escape by the thief, Rotten Peely, that wreaked havoc in Brick Bay! Some Residents reported wiped out inventory, Creds, and even entire homes! However, rest assured that order has been restored.\r\n\r\nThe Brick Bay Municipal Department (in partnership with a generous donation from Midas), is <emphasis>gifting Creds to all Residents</> for the inconvenience.

FortSetting.GamepadAutoRun_Description: Turns controller auto-run on/off. When on, double clicking the Left Stick will make you automatically run forward without needing to hold the Left Stick forward.
FortSetting.QuickWeaponButtonGroup_Description_Switc: While Quick Weapon is held, which group of buttons should be used for selecting weapons? Use the directional buttons, the A/B/X/Y buttons, or both.
FortSetting.GyroV2SpaceSwitch_Description:
How the motion inputs are converted to camera Yaw and Pitch rotations when playing with a Pro Controller or Joy-Con controllers detached from the console.

LOCAL space means rotation is detected from the device's point of view, and will work the same whether you're lying down, sitting up, in zero gravity, etc. This means it's often the best option for handheld gaming.

PLAYER space will detect motion relative to the direction of gravity, giving you the most freedom of movement and the most natural camera control when you're playing with a controller in front of a fixed screen.

AmpleHammer.SettingDescription:
<text color="00FFD6FF" fontface="black" case="upper" size="20">ON</>: Your child can interact with AI features in Epic Games products through voice and written communication. This includes interacting with conversational AI non-playable characters in Fortnite

<text color="00FFD6FF" fontface="black" case="upper" size="20">OFF</>: Your child cannot interact with AI features in Epic Games' products through voice and written communication.

Note: This control does not apply to AI-powered player support interactions.
AmpleHammer.DetailName: Allow voice and written communication with AI Features
